website_summaries.verdict: The $200 UE Boom is a versatile and durable wireless Bluetooth speaker that plays loud and is great for on-the-go use.
pros: The UE Boom is a compact, durable wireless Bluetooth speaker that plays very loud for its size and is water- and stain-resistant
It offers up to 15 hours of battery life, has speakerphone capabilities, and is well-suited to outdoor use
Also, if you buy a second speaker, you can create a completely wireless pair of true stereo speakers using the UE Boom app for iOS and Android devices
cons: while the sound quality is very good for a speaker this size, the bass could be fuller

customer_reviews.title: The original and best
customer_reviews.text: My gf used took my Boom on vacay and lost it. Otherwise the thing was bullet proof. Took it to work with me constantly (speaker phone). The beach, parties, around the house. Dropped it too many times to count and it always worked. So, I got a new Boom 3. I'm so disappointed. Looks great, but can't be used for phone calls. Found this out when I took it to work the first day and was showing off my new and "improved" speaker. Major embarrassing fail. Tried to salvage the situation by plugging in an aux cable. Surprise! No 3.5mm jack. I'm returning the 3 tomorrow and shopping for the original.
customer_reviews.author: F. Vahaman

customer_reviews.title: Best Just Got Better: An Audiophile's Review
customer_reviews.text: This is a true audiophile's review. Regarding Sound Quality: High: 9.8 Mid: 9.9 Low: 7.5 Regarding Toughness: Fully Rain/Splash/Showerproof Withstands drops from 5-10 feet perfectly. Visual Wear: 8.0 8-10 Hours of Full Volume Playback Regarding Popularity: Popularity 9.0 Price Performace Rating: 10/10 Short Description: Hands Down "The Best Speaker in the World" in the "Portable Bluetooth Speaker" Category. Do not look back at other rival speakers like Bose or others because this is the ONLY Speaker that is perfect for an audiophile and/or everyone else. It is very good for those who have an active or outdoors life and love taking their favorite music to savour those special moments alone, or even with friends This is your way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Kai S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have had this speaker for 5 years, not one issue. You need to have it pretty close to your phone (if that's what it's connected to) to play music, but otherwise I have zero complaints. We have taken this speaker on trips, gotten it wet, dropped it multiple times (2 kids...) and it's held up great. The batter life is decent. We charge it before a trip and it's fine the whole time. We love this little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one of those big Jawbone boxes that wouldn't connect anymore. Doesn't sound as good as one of the huge name-brand bluetooth boxes...but it really does sound very good for the price. I tested nearly every brand in this size category, and I'd recommend this to anyone. They still sell an upgraded version in the store, so UE Boom isn't going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: DesertMirage

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. Horrible Mother in law.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my potential mother-in-law last Christmas. She loved it. This Christmas when I went back, she called me all kinds of nasty names, insulted my family and my culture (I'm Asian), and threw me out of her house two days before Christmas. As I was packing to leave her house, with her yelling and screaming downstairs in the kitchen, I figured I'd pack the UE Boom I got her with me. I'm glad I did - because the sound is amazing, and I bring it all the time with me when I go picnic with my boyfriend. He and I aren't talking to his mother anymore. But at least this UE Boom is nice.
customer_reviews.author: AliceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Refurb but CAN'T TELL IT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one in the mega also, I like this one so much that I had to get the bigger one as well... I have them linked UP and connected to my television during movies and they sound awesome!!! When it came in it look like it was brand new but I bought the refurbished one! Don't have second thoughts about buying one refurbished from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marsh Christmas

customer_reviews.title: It does not charge any more only after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Broken after 3 months. It does not charge any more (maybe only charge to 5% level after plugged in for 10 hours, I tested it many times, trust me). And what's worse, it does not work when it is plugged in and with low battery. It started well when I first received it. And then, the battery is getting worse by worse. Now only after four month, even after plugged in for ~ 10 hours, the battery would last at most 30 min on a "lucky day". Most of time it won't even charge at all. DO NOT BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: ZR

customer_reviews.title: great speaker but shorter battery life
customer_reviews.text: ue boom products are all around my househol. they produce great sound and they are very portable and durable. the only problem is that they only survive for 3-4 hours and that depends on how loud you listen to them. if you bring to the beach or a tailgate you better have multiple that are fully charged so that you can continue listening
customer_reviews.author: stephen a.

customer_reviews.title: A veritable boomtube
customer_reviews.text: Better than the reviewers said. We have a nice JBL speaker we've used for years to listen to books and music. This speaker is a totally different deal. It fills our kitchen-dining-living area with sound. marvelous highs and lows. Easy to pair to our iPhone so we can also take it in the car where we've never been able to figure out how to play music through the speakers successfully. Best of all the phone will talk through the speakers so we can stop the music, talk to friends, and get right back to the music. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker and use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker and use it all the time, would recommend to anyone. Works great in a large room or small space. Gave it 4 stars because I actually bought this one to 'double up' or 'daisy chain' with another one I have. Double up feature is suppose to let the user add multiple boom speakers. Other people seem to have no issue with the double up feature but I had to return the speaker as nothing I did would get two speakers to work properly together... I had the issue of the speakers alternating back and forth playing music vs both playing together at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've bought more than a few bluetooth speakers, including from other brands. I use UE boom speakers on almost daily basis, whether it's in the bathroom getting ready or outside lounging. They're just great quality *fun* speakers. I wouldn't hesitate to buy one again or recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: ocellaris7

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best speaker I have ever purchased and will not get ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best speaker I have ever purchased and will not get anything different. The UE Booms are awesome awesome speakers. Very loud and the bass is amazing and you can connect them with other UE Booms! I have 2 and the surround of the two are just wonderful. It holds charge for a long time, and it is very durable and I have had it in the rain and didn't mess it up at all. I just love it! Can't say anything bad about it really. If you are looking for a good quality speaker, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker with Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are not cheap, but they're the best portable speakers you can buy for your outdoor barbecues, beach parties, bike rides, or just in your home where you don't have fixed speakers. If you can swing it, buy 2 and use the UE Boom app to enable stereo sound. The sound from these speakers really sets them apart from any other bluetooth speaker out there, including comparably-priced Bose Mini wireless speakers. These speakers really produce solid bass and crisp highs from a tiny form-factor. Plus, the battery life is outstanding. The speaker looks like it's well-built and can handle some bouncing around and abuse. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DukeDuker

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for the hard of hearing.
customer_reviews.text: I like to listen to talk radio in the shower. I'm very hard of hearing, so I need a lot of volume especially in the higher frequencies. I use the program to shift audio response; still, there is too much base for my specialized wants. It also drops out if it doesn't receive music for fifteen minutes, which it often does as I do not always reset it before I get into the shower. Yes, I have tried the wireless Portable Bluetooth transmitter on a portable radio, but it still doesn't do quite what I would like it to do. Wish I could wear my hearing aids in the shower...
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality from a portable speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker from Logitech. For those who don't know, UE or Ultimate Ear is a Logitech brand. The battery life is great and lasts my well over 3 weeks on standby. Total usage time is about 13 hours. I never ran into an instance where I ran out of battery. Ten sound quality is loud and great. The bass is a little lacking but not much. It is a portable speaker but still gives a great sound. I highly recommend this speaker. I had 4 family and friends purchase this and they love it as well. It's rugged and well built so you can be assured that it can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. Charges quickly with a micro-usb cable
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Charges quickly with a micro-usb cable, a durable version of which was included in the package. Attractive and durable. Turns on and connects easily (after initial Bluetooth connection to a device) with a single button-press. A little expensive, but you get what you pay for. This speaker is light and portable and follows me around my apartment, generally amplifying the terrifying news perpetuating NPR these days.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Not even a full year before it started to malfunction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for $129 in April and it is now October and I'm having trouble with the speaker turning off a minute or two after I turn it on. So every single time i turn it on I pair it to my phone, it turns off, and then I have to turn it on and pair it again (usually when I'm driving). I was very impressed with the speaker until this happened, other than that the sound quality is phenomenal. But I'm disappointed that I spent so much money and barely got six months with this speaker before it started malfunctioning! Maybe I just got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: DrDLVS

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, but speakerphone doesn't work and bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is really good for its size and plays music well. It also connects via Bluetooth well. The app works okay and you can pair up two for a stereo sound. I took two stars off as the speaker phone does not work on it, and the horrible customer service. Calling Logitech leads down a path of hitting one for this, two for that, etc. and then being put on hold for a long time and then on line with a rep that doesn't know anything. It deserves four stars for the sound, the ability to hold a charge, and the overall quality. Bad customer service and the lack of usability as a speakerphone take away two stars though.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: 9 months owned and issues.
customer_reviews.text: Update. Only after 9 months, the speaker continues to cut in and out. Sound level is also not up to par anymore. Still under warranty and trying to work with Logitech to ship out a replacement. For $180, this item is expected to perform better. Update. With some software updates, the unit performed much better. In todays market and competition, I still think its priced a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tides

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for just about any occasion!
customer_reviews.text: After personally testing various bluetooth speakers (in stores and via friends) I've found that this is currently my favorite! It has the best "bass", although artificial sounding, still sounds better than the crisper sharper sounds of equivalent styles. (I suggest downloading the EU BOOM app for a sound EQ) Pretty great battery life, on low it'll last hoooours, on high I've had it last as little at 3 hours on a full charge. I think it may depend on what you're listening to, the environment (extreme heat/cold) and if you're connected to the AUX port or via bluetooth. It survived several camping trips, a festival, 9 days at Burning Man, and many BBQ's - still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna P

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth Speaker. It's big enough to have the sound you want and yet very portable. I am impressed with the sound quality and at full volume there is no distortion. A little more volume would be nice but is loud enough for comfortable listening and centrally located I can here it clearly throughout my house. It is tapped for a camera tripod and I purchased a mini tripod on Amazon and I really like the stability and good looks of the combo. Everyone who hears and sees this speaker wants one. I highly recommend this speaker. Give it a try, you can always return it. Amazon's customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: E. Man

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Portable and Durable speaker for all situations with solid sound!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time, everywhere and beat it up. Only thing I regret is getting it in white, it is a little dingy now. This thing has been tossed around, rained on, in the shower, on the beach, and used to carry around the house in different rooms. Pairs easily with my phone, laptop, or Apple TV. Sound quality is very solid, gets pretty loud!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Ljung

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I spent a lot of time sound checking different bluetooth speakers, and found beyond a doubt that this was the best, fullest sound for such a phenomenal price. Even better than Bose, which I've always been partial to. The UE BOOM gets a louder, CLEAN sound, with strong bass than any other speaker we looked at. It's durable, (especially with the case that you can also purchase), holds a long charge and it a perfect size. It fills out sound for everything from the beach blanket, to a bbq pool party. Best purchase.
customer_reviews.author: seabird

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered this speaker at my local Verizon store. At the time it had just come out so was way more expensive than what I wanted to pay. I waited for the price to drop and immediately when I did purchased it off of Amazon. This speaker is awesome! So easy to connect with your phone. The clarity is wonderful. The sound is amazing! Great to have for working out, in the garage, cleaning around your house, working in the yard, washing your car, etc. One of the best electronic purchases I have made in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse26

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I loved this speaker. I purchased my first in September 2013. Two weeks later, I bought a second. I periodically travel for work, and these were a fantastic portable stereo for hotel rooms. I used these speakers roughly 1 week out of every month or two. Fast forward to the end of 2014, both speakers would no longer charge past 60%. Fast forward again to mid 2015. Charging would now take 12+ hours to get 30%. These days I use these as book ends and/or paper weights.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound, Solid Build, Nice Footprint
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding Bluetooth speaker. We've gone through a number of different Bluetooth devices (from Jawbone to no-name brands). Either they didn't hold up over time, or the sound quality was extremely low. This UE BOOM went with us on a trip to Hawaii and back, goes out on our boat, and sits on our deck. It has survived all of that and delivers high quality sound. The build quality is solid, and we're hoping to use this for many years. It also has a nice footprint and design aesthetic. You can certainly find higher quality sound - but probably not at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: LUCK

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN BOSE AND BEATS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for $199 about a year ago and it is absolutely worth the money. WAY better than any bose product out there. I had the beats by dre speakers but ended up returning it for this speaker. the sound is AMAZING. plus, you can have two music devices connected to the speaker at one time, so as soon as you pause the music on one, you can start playing music on the other. it works great at parties, people are always amazed by the sound this thing puts out. if you're hesitant about dropping the money on an unfamiliar brand, put your doubts away now. This thing is AWESOME, you will have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: UE BOOM Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - Blue
customer_reviews.text: I have gone thru several bluetooth speakers both the inexpensive & expensive ones & I must say that the UE Boom has been my favorite in terms of functionality & price. Initial set up & pairing is a breeze. What I particularly like is that once you have it paired to your smartphone, you can just turn it on with the app provided. It gives you enough control of the speaker from the smartphone app that you don't even need to physically go to the speaker. The sound is very good for its size. It produced a louder bass than expected. Being water resistant is definitely a plus when bringing it outdoors. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: parokyaniedgar

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and portability.
customer_reviews.text: Really great portable speaker. Sound is great. I ended up buying a cover with a strap so it is very easy to carry all around. I got this at a great price Black Friday but looking for a second one at the same deal...I don't even care the color if I get another cover the same and that way I can have two playing the same music around my house, or one inside and one outside at the same time for parties. My sister has a Bose, and to be honest, I don't like all the bass. No complaints, works as expected. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tigershops

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim but have to admit it's become one of the more popular devices in our household. Sounds good tunred up some, in fact we found ourselves having to move it to a more remote point during a barbeque because you could not talk near it but it was providing music for our whole back porch. Easy to sync and charge, Easy to use.. I have yet to look at the directions.. We have run it for a couple hours without recharging.. I'm quite pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Hands-Down The Loudest Bluetooth Speaker of This Size
customer_reviews.text: I will preface this review by saying I have owned multiple bluetooth speakers, including the Jawbone, the highly rated a.m.p. SP1, and a large TDK wireless boombox. This is simply the loudest bluetooth speaker for this size, and the only one that can be paired with another one of the same speaker for full stereo sound. Additionally, the firmware is updatable, and the charge time is significantly less than other models. I am linking two of these together via the (free) downloadable UE app on my Galaxy S4 (streaming bluetooth of course). I have these mounted on the rear water bottle cages on my road bike and the sound is louder than some cars. Just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but I'm no audiophile.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and it works awesome! Holds a charge plenty long for how she uses it and never worries about where she brings it. I was going to get a Bose until someone convinced me to get this one and no regrets. While I'm no audiophile I don't think you necessarily buy one of this and critique it for how true the bass is. You get it because you want to be able to play it wherever you go, want it to be able to play it loud enough and clear enough for your environment, and not die on you in the middle of your day. And it delivers on those points.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great used speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is freaking amazing for its smaller size. I worked at a restaurant on The Hill in Boulder, CO and we had the bright blue Megaboom speaker, so I knew the big ones were great, and this smaller version is great too. I do wish it were just a tab bit louder at its MAX volume as I like pretty loud music, but will ok until I buy the bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: toni clemens

customer_reviews.title: What a great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The sound is very good. The unit is portable and the shipping container is great for transporting the unit. I haul my BOOM Wireless Speaker around my home wherever I am to listen the my music that is on my Kindle Fire HDX. The BOOM locks up right now to the Blue Tooth signal. Recently I took my BOOM and Kindle to Orlando to have good vibes in my Time Share unit. Even though I had the BOOM shipping container available, I just used a sock to cover the unit in my suit case. The unit is built sturdy. I'm considering buying a second unit to distribute the sounds around my back yard when entertaining friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkering Through Life

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Bluetooth phone speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for about four months now... waited to see how well the battery lasted and how the UE BOOM accepted firmware updates... Just a fantastic speaker, IMHO. Great battery life and acoustics, nice bottom end (except when compared to your home speakers, but where's the fairness in that comparison?), and good software updates when connected via USB to your PC. Very tough design, can play catch with it with friends when you can't find a baseball... what else do you need? Haven't tried any slapshots with it while on the ice...
customer_reviews.author: Willie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this, have ended up buying more products from this brand because it works so well, has a long battery life and great sound. The waterproof aspect is great for trips to the lake and the pool, as well as in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Reece

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished is good value
customer_reviews.text: I am upgrading my previous review or product and seller. Originally reviewed disappointment that charging cord was not included. Seller noted my review and replied with offer to send original charging cord. They sent asap. This is a very good speaker for excellent price value. I like sound as well or better than brands offered at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scout772

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for My Needs
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker close to a year. Still sounds great and I use it every night when I go to bed with the Bluetooth and tablet, watching youtube videos. When I wake up in the morning the speaker has turned itself off saving the battery power. On a charged battery I would say I can use it for 1-2 hours a night for 2 weeks. I chose this speaker over the JBL Pulse. It was a hard choice, but figured I didn't need the disco lights even if I turned them off. At the store the BOOM was louder them the Pulse
customer_reviews.author: Orange408

customer_reviews.title: DyNoMite!!
customer_reviews.text: This is what the saying "Dynamite comes in small packages" is all about. This little cylinder is packed with sound! We have a classic !962 Chevy Impala SS that we cruise in. The radio does not work. We wanted a great sound without replacing the radio with a state of the art one that would take away from the stock and authenticity of our ride. The UE Box fits us just right. My husband's daily driver does not have hands-free so he uses the UEBoom in his truck to listen to his tunes on his iPhone. When a phone call comes in, the UE Boom automatically syncs up and he's hands free. Love this UE Boom!
customer_reviews.author: BDid

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bluetooth traveling sound system
customer_reviews.text: Another one of those Right Tool for the Right Job, this mighty mite plays music as loud as the law should allow in blazingly glorious audio with solid bass and crystal high end, with a built in battery that lasts for hours and can be put up on any shelf or countertop. Connect with bluetooth to your iPhone and play DJ for your family or the dinner guests. Very portable. Very listenable. Very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. I finally found one that was loud enough! Have bought a few less expensive bluetooth speakers, all of which had reviews about "booming sound" from something so small. This is the only one I've had that lived up to the claim! At $100 for Black Friday it's a great buy. My only complaint is that you can't control the tracks from the speaker, must be done from the phone/tablet. App is nice to be able to check the charge. Would be great if they could enable tracks though.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hultquist

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love it, sounds great for its size and the battery lasts forever. It's speakers are positioned in different directions which is great for filling an outdoor space with music. The newer version is waterproof but I don't plan on getting it wet so I like this one just fine. There's also the megaboom but I'm not as inclined to carry around that mega thing despite its larger sound. For me the UE Boom is the perfect Bluetooth speaker. It's just works right of the box and sounds fantastic. The only con I can think of is the bass could be deeper but that's all you can really get with that size.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Masinter

customer_reviews.title: Good sound; not much in the bass
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how much I needed a bluetooth speaker until I got this puppy. Now he follows me everywhere, especially between the kitchen and the dining table. The android app even lets me turn it on and off remotely, though I found that to be spotty and unreliable. The sound quality is great, though the bass notes are not powerful. The battery life is insane on this thing. The build is rugged and appealing. I'm looking forward to exploring this thing around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin Mudigonda

customer_reviews.title: I give live audience interactive lectures and use music to ...
customer_reviews.text: I give live audience interactive lectures and use music to enhance the experience, usually with large sound systems. One week ago during a presentation my main music system failed and I had the UE BOOM in my bag so I used it as my only resource and was surprised on the volume and quality of sound it gave considering I was in a large conference room with an audience of over 100. It did the job. At the end of the lecture, many people came over to check out this little wonder. I am definitely going to get another to use them as pairs. Get it, you won`t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel (Mike) Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on it being one of the best rated Bluetooth speaker of 2015 and 2016. I was not disappointed. It is very loud, has about a 50 range from my phone, and the battery will last all day. I bought this on deployment so I can confirm that is very durable. I would get tossed in my bag with the rest of my gear and get kicked over in the sand daily without any damage. For me, this was the perfect speaker. Quality sound. Very durable and affordable, especially compared to a Bose or a Beats Pill. In my opinion, this product is superior to all others currently on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice higher notes, product layout is strange
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good. Compared it to the Bose mini, the upper registers are much crisper and brighter. Bose seemed very flat. I do understand sound preference is subjective. As to the layout / design, the power cord is on the very bottom of the device, so leaving it just plugged in renders the device unable to be stood up on end so the sound can emanate 360 degrees. If you use it upside down, the power cord would come out the top, and it is bright yellow. Not too attractive, and it would have been so easy to have the power cord plug into the side. Overall glad I bought it and the quality seems high.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible
customer_reviews.text: I was just thinking that I've owned this little speaker for about seven years, and in those seven years, I've dropped it off a second story balcony, used it daily as a shower radio, and for 3 of those years it used it daily in a 9th grade classroom as a speaker for my laptop. The sound quality is... fine. As good as you'll ever get streaming compressed music over Bluetooth to a digital speaker. But the damn thing is indestructible, and I still get 6+ hours out of the battery on each charge.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: winner winner.  great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked for a solid portable speaker system. I went to a big box store to test out different models and makes. This fit the mold for everything i was looking for. Small, easy to carry, has a clip to attach to a bag, fits in a cup holder, etc. The sound is amazing. not much for BASS but its crisp and loud. I was looking at the Bose but opted on the UE Boom. I'm very happy with my choice. I've put this thing under running water and no issues what so ever. the battery lasted me 14 plus hours. (3 weeks of music)
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Get it, forget other brands! This is best BT speaker out there!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best bluetooth speaker money can buy! If you need bigger you can go with a Mega Boom instead but this one can liven up a whole room or 2 easily. Good bass, good highs, amazing volume and battery life. I have about 3 of these and with the UE APP you can have all them play same song at same time. These fit in a bottle holder on most backpacks which is why I use them for hiking often!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Has loud, clear sound. Sound travels well ( indoor and outdoor ). Can pair up with other booms which we have done to make gatherings or bbq's have more sound in more places around the house. Battery life lives up to expectations. It obviously doesn't last 15 hours if volume is turn all the way up, but still is better than any other in price range. Bass isn't as load as BOSE Mini but for all the benefits of the Boom and having ability to upgrade software is a major plus! Best on market for price. read reviews and comparison videos online if you want more info.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goben

customer_reviews.title: Listen to Queen's "the Prophets Song", articulates how well this speaker performs.
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I am not one to use that phrase often, but, I have had this devise for 3 hours and have been putting it through its paces. I tried several of my favorite bands to see how it performed. I went through The Who, Robin Trower, Zeppelin, but when I got to Queen's song "The Prophets Song" I was blown away. I had listened to this album since I was 12, and never heard it this way, I think if you want to know how well this speaker performs listen to this song, the speaker really articulates how well this speaker performs.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Waupoose

customer_reviews.title: can get very loud and the battery life has been great, too
customer_reviews.text: Sounds crisp, can get very loud and the battery life has been great, too. A nice little feature about this is that when you turn on, turn off or connect to a device, it makes a satisfying bongo sound; as many other Bluetooth devices have tended to have annoying prompts or sound effects. Small, substantial quality feel to it, I'm very happy with this so far (1 month of daily use).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for no regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased with the packaging and sound quality of this UE BOOM, and the newest update is much better. Wireless on/off and custom EQ. The one thing that troubles me is the battery life percentage and the battery functionality. The battery will say 100% when checked, but in reality, I know it is much less than 100%. It might not be reading correctly. The other night, I started at 50% and within 30 minutes at high volume, not max volume, the battery depleted quickly and the UE BOOM said, "Critical Battery. Please charge." Those two reasons are why I docked a star.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful:  sturdy speaker provides fabulous volume for hearing impaired
customer_reviews.text: Have been searching for years now for a speaker my grandmother can use to watch Downton Abby, etc. in bed on her iPad and clearly hear the dialogue. Ear buds do not work for her when she's wearing her hearing aid, obviously. Bought her this speaker and she says it works great. Blue-tooth pairing can be a challenge for the old and the young -- but once that's mastered, this speaker is marvelous. However, if blue-tooth pairing from iPad to this little speaker is too confusing, just get your grandmother an auxiliary cord. 5-stars. It's marvelous.
customer_reviews.author: Anon1234

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for me and I returned it. Not sure if it was my laptop setup or this unit, but when I was bluetoothing it to watch streaming video there was a noticeable lag and the off-sync was unacceptable. For music playing purposes, I wanted it to fill a bigger room (small classroom) for teaching dance and even with all hard and bouncy surfaces I was surprised that it wasn't as loud as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Green Zinnias

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Everyone is asking where I got it. It is a little pricey but it's so worth it! I received it quickly. Only problem is that the lighter pink does get a little dingy looking just from every day use and being in my purse and I'm not sure how to clean it but I'm not really worried about it. I originally ordered it for $200, a few days later the price went down to $180, I chatted online with someone from Amazon & he refunded me the $20 just like that!!! I will for sure look into getting another ASAP to double up! Thanks so much :)
customer_reviews.author: jeliza

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Holy sweet baby Jesus. This speaker is amazing, by far the best I have ever used or heard. Price is high but it is worth it if you enjoy music. It has a great companion app that is easy and fun to use with different sound modes that can really change the sound. This thing is loud. Very loud. The build is great, very solid, and feels extremely premium. The battery also lasts a long while. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DevoW

customer_reviews.title: The go anywhere do anything portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Boom for almost a year now, and I always pack it on trips. It uses the same charging connector (USB) as my phone and I generally only charge it every few weeks. The sound quality is amazing and volume is equally impressive. It's water resistant so I have felt comfortable taking it to the beach, on a boat, etc. Only note, the battery seems much shorter if exposed to full sun in the south, but putting it under a chair / in the shade fixes that issue
customer_reviews.author: Darren Alcorn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as a Christmas present so she could listen to music in her office. I compared many small speakers and this came out on top. I was looking for four things: high quality sound, sound that fills the room, long battery life, and ease of operation. the UE Boom met all of those better than any others I found at this price range and size. One other feature this model has that helped set it apart is the speakerphone. It works well and is great for use in the office. I would like to try it in the car but haven't done that yet. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: They've been everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I tested out a bunch of Bluetooth speakers at the Apple store: this one, the one from Bose, Sony, Beats, etc. This one is pretty on par with the Bose Soundlink (not quite as much bass, but sounded better in the mids and highs), which was really the only other speaker I tested that sounded as good. The edge for me was that these can be paired into stereo. They've been everywhere from the beach to the woods to a hotel room (I bring one to avoid dealing with the iHome alarm stuff at most hotels).
customer_reviews.author: Nate Long

customer_reviews.title: Great portable blue tooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he loves it!! Very easy to connect to blue tooth, very portable and great sound quality. The 360* sound is great when we are sitting on the deck. Unlike regular blue tooth speakers that only shoot out in one direction, no one in the room is left out. We have boys who are 18 and 20, so this has become a gift for the entire family
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Moore

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker because of its app
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a Bluetooth speaker this is it. It has so many features like the app. The app is a remote control for it. You can turn it on and off from across the room. You can also double two of the speakers up. The battery life is good and will last a wile. The app has an alarm function to wake you up in the morning. The Bluetooth is easy to use. You also have the ability to use a wire to transfer music which is nice for non-Bluetooth devices. I recommend this to all people.
customer_reviews.author: Phill t Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers/ condition looked used
customer_reviews.text: Speaker itself works great. Awesome spreading sound, easy to use app to manage the EQ and Batteries. Syncing with my iPhone took just a moment and the volume will easily fill a large room or a small apartment. I removed a star because the "Rubber" or what ever the non mesh surface of it came scuffed up pretty significantly. A lot of it seemed to be on the side where the volume buttons are. I am not sure if they all come like this or if I should be concerned that I was sent a used item. Should have just gone to the apple store and paid the extra 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Riviere

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by both the volume and sound quality. I used this outdoors in a large (40x80) open tent and everyone could hear the music quite well. The ease of use and controls are very good. Two of my friends bought one after hearing this. I am not an audiophile, but the sound quality is better than that of Acoustic Research and Bose at a lower price. I think another one would be great so I can get true stereo sound on my deck without install permanent speakers.
customer_reviews.author: GalvezGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them with the cases, attached on the belt in the stereo mode and sometimes I feeling I made wings for myself. 4-5 hours if loud, but not a problem, for the long time if I will need, I'll put power bank in the middle (they work in during charging). Very good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Konst

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding speaker. It took me a few minutes to figure out how to synch it, as directions were not supplied. The speaker was received in great shape and they did a great job packaging it to ensure that it would be received in good order. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor function
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying the sound quality is excellent. My positive review ends there however. The first major issue is that the blue tooth cuts in and out especially when a person walks in between the speaker and the music source. Extremely annoying in our place of business where customers walk all around the shop. Next, the instructions are poor at best and linking two speakers is an exercise in frustration. Some times they stay linked, other times you have to guess what or how to get them operating, they never seem to do the same thing twice. We would not recommend these to friends or anyone......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Sound fills the room. We have a pair for stereo (works now 2015 using Bluetooth 4.0) (a big advantage over competing products) Long battery life, perhaps 12 - 15 hours use before we recharge. (Press + and - together, voice feedback tells percent charge.) They are large and heavy, would not carry in coat pocket. However great for indoors and party outdoors (in good weather).
customer_reviews.author: Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Love this, convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy and cute. Nicely designed, easy, easy to carry and use. Sound is perfect for my teenager and I use it while I am cooking. No, it isn't the best speaker in the world with all the highs and super bass etc..., but it is certainly adequate for most people to listen to music conveniently when they normally may not. The sound is good. I even like to take it outside when I am working in the yard or on the porch. I don't have to have earbuds in and miss what is going on around me. Super product. Love it. Add more music to your life!
customer_reviews.author: b.rae

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, good sound, easy to use. One downside is that the device occasionally has to be updated on the PC or the phone app will not work. The 360sound works great outside. Bluetooth device needs to be fairly close to the speaker to avoid cutting out. I wanted a good speaker but within a reasonable price range. I wasn't interested in spending more than $200. and this was a good choice. I got it for my boyfriend and he said it's one of the best presents he ever got.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Great Things Come in Small Packages!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am no expert by any means but this thing is awesome!!! Took it right out of the cool packaging and it hooked up immediately to my Samsung S5...did q quick Bluetooth search and there it was...turned on tunes and this thing blew me away...it is SO LOUD and SO CRISP!!! Unbelievable for such a small speaker...and this thing has some weight to it!!! Does not feel cheaply made at all....cannot wait to get this going in the back yard this year!!! I would highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: A great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best portable speaker I've ever owned. Great sound, battery life is good, not great but definitely good.
customer_reviews.author: G. Scott Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Life of the party
customer_reviews.text: Title is no joke. The design is AWESOME, it came in a slick and sick cylindrical package...I've owned this for 1+ years and I still have the package I honestly loved it that much. But let's get back to the speakers. Can I just say it's hard for me to get over how much sound this little thing produces? It gets LOUD! Not loud enough to cover the noise 70 people make on a rooftop, as I had found out last weekend. But for smaller parties at home, this is a game changer! PARTY ON!
customer_reviews.author: Blake B.

customer_reviews.title: The best speaker I've ever owned...
customer_reviews.text: This is singlehandedly one of my favorite electronics purchases of the last 5 years. I use this speaker at home about 2-3 times a day. Getting ready in the morning, mowing the lawn, hanging out making dinner, and when i travel i throw it in my carry-on. The battery is unbelievable, lasting 2-3 weeks, and the sound is amazing for its size. I would recommend this speaker over any other speakers I have read reviews on, listened to in the store, and heard at friends or families homes. Definitely give this one a try if you are looking!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This is a great speaker but the battery life is not 15 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker but the battery life is not 15 hours (maybe at low volume). But I like to play mine at 80% volume and when I do the battery dies within 3 hours. 60%-70% volume it lasts about 4 1/2 hours. Now that wasn't the case when it was brand new but after having it 1 month the battery seems a lot weaker. I like everything about this speaker except it's battery life. Maybe I just got a dud. Oh and I emailed the u.e. boom Web site about it and I have not got a response yet...
customer_reviews.author: Jorge I.

customer_reviews.title: nice speake
customer_reviews.text: Expensive yes. Worth it? Yes. Speaker is unobtrusive and nice looking. Everyone I have shown is impressed with the sound quality from such a little speaker. I switch from normal mode for music to voices mode for podcasts. I take it in the shower with me everyday and put it in the shower caddy next to the shower head. I have no worries about it getting a little wet. Only downside would be replacing the battery when it eventually dies. My research indicated that it is an 18650 battery. I will cross that bridge when. I get to it.
customer_reviews.author: slappy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and durability in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker with good depth of sound and low distortion at levels suitable to fill a room. I purchased this to replace a Jawbone Jambox which is a little bit smaller. The Boom is a better sounding speaker for the money and doesn't take up too much extra space. The Boom did a good job on low end frequency response with its two additional passive drivers. It's about as good as one can get for a speaker this size.
customer_reviews.author: UcMike

customer_reviews.title: Battery stopped charging after 4-5 times...so far NO SUPPORT from manufacturer !
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in that after less than 4-5 charges to the battery it stopped taking a charge and now inoperable. It was a very fine (and pricey) product while it worked (great sound and good looking design) and now worthless. I checked the internet and it seems there are many that have and are continuing experiencing the same problem and UE BOOM/Logitech have yet to addressed the problem. Do they stand by their product...??...so far no solutions on their website.....I have emailed them twice and awaiting a reply....will see....meantime I suggest you stay away from this company and specially their wireless speaker.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Rovirosa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is better then described, looks new, sounds New, and talk about sound, this thing absolutely rocks, my friends couldn’t believe it was Bluetooth... AAAAA++++++ To this seller. Thank you, I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Not as impressed as I thought I would be with this unit. It does work pretty decent, and it's my first wireless speaker, so I don't have anything to compare against. I am probably being unfair as it cannot be put up against the rest of the audio devices at my disposal. It works great for its intended purpose though. I would like to try a wireless woofer with it, to add a little low end, to see how that turns out. I am happy overall with the unit though!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from these speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from these speakers. Compact, lightweight. Bought 2 of these, and linked together using the phone App., has amazing stereo sound. And loud too, without any distortion. I take these on my Kayak and they have gotten splashed without harming. But would NOT recommend soaking or dunking them in water. Had to upgrade the software on both of these (using my PC) so that they had the same software version, before i could link them for stereo sound. The battery has a decent charge cycle. The louder you play them, the more often you have to charge them...
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy minimal design!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! It's easy to use with my Mac/iPhone/iPad. The boom app gives you some extra controls for EQ and such. I was looking for a great sounding wireless speaker and after seeing s positive review for this one I'm glad I decided to buy this. I give it 4/5 because the bass response isn't quite where I want it to be even with the bass booster EQ preset but other than that this is a great buy. The fact that you can hook multiple devices at the same time is awesome too! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for no larger than this speaker is. The hook is to buy two speaker and have stereo sound. The speakers do not separate channels so this isn't a realistic option. I have outdoor speakers when I want a little more sound and true stereo effect. This speaker isn't designed for that. However, if you want to take it on the boat or have some music around the campfire, this is a great little speaker that delivers surprisingly good sound for it's size. I believe it out performs the Bose counter part quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H Gyllstrom

customer_reviews.title: They WERE great. Easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: They WERE great. Easy to transport, easy to sync, easy to set up etc. UE requests you update SW. So we did, 3-4 times in the past year. no issues. About an hour ago, I got off the phone with tech support. I updated to the most recent and it turned both UE's into bricks. They wont even turn on. The best part.... they are both just out of warrantee. So this is my fault and they won't replace. OR FIX.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher StClair

customer_reviews.title: Used to love it!
customer_reviews.text: Update:08-21-2015...The speaker went from working really well, to NOT ING. We can no longer charge it or power it up at all. I am so bummed! We bought in Dec 2014. It should have lasted more than a year and a half! Dec 2013...This speaker works well for all that we have used it for...music on the beach, music in the house, sound for training video in a small work/meeting setting. All without any trouble at all. We have it paired with a droid, an iPhone and a laptop and all work seamlessly!
customer_reviews.author: N. Norsby

customer_reviews.title: An excellent bluetooth speaker with some serious flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The UE Boom is a very high quality bluetooth speaker that I recommend with a few reservations. I have outlined the pros and cons so far below: Pros: Sounds great for its size Great battery life (for now) High quality construction (including water resistance) Good bluetooth range Cons: Battery replacement is very difficult and voids the warranty! It is a very expensive device to not have a replaceable battery. No Windows control app (must use iphone or android device) Minimal control interface on the speaker itself No way to adjust the timeout shutoff
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: buy this.  quit looking at other crap
customer_reviews.text: Gosh I had a one of those basic Jawbones for $100. I really wasn't satisfied upon using it. The sound felt hollow (I'm not some audiophile). I came into a bit more money for my birthday and upgraded to this bad boy. NOT DISAPPOINTED... It is a bit heavier, but SO worth it. Used it during gaming sessions with friends, while showering and getting ready for work, and everyday usage. don't be cheap and get the $100 jobbies. Get this sucker. I'm tellin ya, worth...it
customer_reviews.author: M. Citro

customer_reviews.title: Big sound small speaker
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very loud and clear. Also it seems very durable. I've bumped mine, dropped it and it still works fine...ok to take into the bathroom during showers due to it's water resistant. Works well and loud enough for outside at BBQ's....My wife's cousin saw this and was so taken that she asked where she could get one...my wife then gave it to her! Knowing a thing or two about staying married...I said nothing, I got on my phone and ordered another one! I love this little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: A Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for this price range
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for this price range. Great sound from all angles due to its shape. In comparison to the Bose and Beats equivalent, it performs great and I would suggest purchasing this over the competition. Only thing that is not perfect is the base it has. On base intensive songs this can tend to fall short. But otherwise it performs amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Torin Grenda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality from something as large as a tall can of beer.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Read the reviews from the tech pros, they will verify what I'm telling you. What impressed me most was the battery life on this thing. I bought this thing 20 days ago, have probably listened to it for about 30 hours on moderate volume, and it's still at 40% battery life. Highly portable, easy to connect to multiple devices, great sound quality, impressive battery life...what more could you ask for? Thinking about buying a second one so I can entertain and have one indoors and another outdoors with both playing from the same source.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: UE Boom is the best value for a Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. One of my daughters owns a $300 Beats Pill and the other owns a $300 Bose Soundlink Mini. The UE Boom outperforms the Beats Pill and compares well to the Bose Soundlink Mini and it only cost $179 versus $299 for the other two. But I did not purchase it because of the price, I purchased it because I am a cyclist and the UE Boom fits very well into my water bottle holder, plus, the battery lasts 12 - 18 hours easily depending on how loud you crank the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: Great, powerful speaker
customer_reviews.text: After researching all of the speaker products (and I am not savy on this topic usually) I kept coming across the UE Boom. I love this speaker and am so glad I went with this product. I have bad it for about a year now and it still works perfectly. Plays music clearly and loudly. Really perfect for parties or just playing around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Christi901

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in the shower, taken it to the beach, packed it in to camp site. It has been great for almost 3 years. The only issue is that it now turns off after pairing with my iPhone. I just turn it back on and it pairs. That's not too bad for a speaker I have used a lot in rough conditions.
customer_reviews.author: WY Brook

customer_reviews.title: and I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: These speakers really rock. Finding a PAIR of BLUETOOTH STEREO speakers is nearly impossible, and after looking at these, I took the plunge and bought two ... and I am glad I did! The app that it uses for make it stereo is user-friendly. Switching between different portable devices can be a little tricky if you decide you want to stream the music from your iPad instead of your iPhone, but it works. Simple setup, excellent quality, has mount for putting on tripod or will stand on their own. Charger and cable are first class.
customer_reviews.author: DrDDD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers! I've bought 2 more since! UE is excellent quality for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Zac Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over the Beats Audio due to a professional review. It is almost as much in cost (saved maybe $20), but the sound quality does sound a little better than the Pill, if not as good, especially at higher volumes. Bought it for the wife and she couldn't be happier. Had it for over four months and no problems. She links it to an Android. Should be noted that the professional said this could have difficulties linking to an iPhone. I guess testing was enough to mention this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone looking for a mobile speaker. My boyfriend has the mini boom and when we saw this and heard it at a local Verizon store, we had to have it. It has great sound quality and get exceptionally loud for its size. Being 360 sound is awesome because you don't have to move it around as much when entertaining people. It is made well and has an awesome storage case to keep it in when not in use. Its tough for sure and you can tell right when you take it out of the box that it is rugged made for a reason. I love it and I am extremely satisfied with everything about it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Terrific portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality, at impressive volume, for such a small speaker. Great choice for travel. Excellent battery life. I did quite a bit of research before purchasing the BOOM, and I am pleased with the product. Price point is high, which is the main reason I subtracted one star, but you get what you pay for. I may purchase a second to take advantage of the synched stereo approach (however, once you buy a couple, you are getting into Sonos price range).
customer_reviews.author: JFWoodman

customer_reviews.title: My Party and lullaby machine
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing! Easy to pair with devices. It really does give me a clean sound with a boom. it's not just loud it actually sounds good. it does great with complex music as well as simple acoustics. I use this speaker to put my one year old daughter to sleep every night listening to Petite Biscuit "Night lover" and dare I say it...... "Mark My Words" by Justin Bieber. yea..... this speaker is amazing lbs
customer_reviews.author: Drea Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe the sound that comes out of this little speaker. I take it everywhere with me. Even outdoors the sound travels very well and fills a large space. Looking forward to getting a second one to see how that works. I've compared it to the Bose Soundlink and the smaller portable bose (I forget the name of it). Blows the smaller bose out of the water. The Soundlink has better lows but this is just as loud. If I just wanted something around the house where I was always close to an outlet, I would get the Soundlink. For better portability and much better battery life, you can't beat this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: WesB
